had stop working issue and sound issue with windows 7 64 bit fixed by installing in programs 86 in local disk then changing compatibility to windows 7. the sound issue open the recording devices on volume control show disabled devices enable stereo mix for any other questions jcaldwell10@yahoo.com

great game just finished it for the first time only ting you have to jump through a few hoops to get it to work and see to differ from person to person on how they got it to work. my friend downloaded and installed with no issues at all and we are both running same setup. if nothing on here works go to nosteams web site for other thingsthat worked for others.

I'm running Win7 x64, and at first the game wouldn't run at all. I put it in "Win 7" compatibility mode and the game started, but I didn't get any sound.

The answer for me was to switch to Win XP SP2 compatibility. Game runs great!

Another issue I found a fix for: I couldn't change the resolution. Whenever I'd hit apply, the game would crash. The answer is to add " -dx9" (without quotes) to a shortcut to the bioshock.exe file, at the end of the target box in the properties of the shortcut.
